description: So far, it was fun. I'm leaving this rating. MIght go up with future playsFOFA Candidat

title: VIKINGS!
description: Vikings, Area Control, a clever battle system, everyone always feels like they’ve still got a chance - this one isn’t famous just because of the awesome physical pieces!  But those are insanely cool too.

title: I was quit...
description: I was quite surprised by this game.  I was actively avoiding it because of the hype, but the group wanted to play so I relented.  It's fine.  I think the monsters might be unbalanced though, maybe they are not, I would not mind additional plays to explore that.

title: The hype f...
description: The hype for this game is real.  Amazing components, amazing gameplay.  One of the best in my collection.

title: Really lik...
description: Really liked the strategic choices of this one. I lost miserably on my first play, but that didn't stop me from having fun. Next time: take more quests!

title: Thinking a...
description: Thinking about it. Played just once and really enjoyed that game, so would like to play again. Still rather expensive, so will not buy anytime soon unless I find a good deal (or 2nd hand).

title: The minis ...
description: The minis are great. The game play is great. I love the theme (big Viking fan). This is one I'd play at anytime and never regret that I played it instead of something else.

title: Finally go...
description: Finally got this during the digital edition KS! Very happy to have it.

title: Wow, not o...
description: Wow, not over-hyped at all. Simply fantastic. Drafting! Minis! Always a surprise right around the corner when we play.

title: This is a ...
description: This is a fantastic game.  I love that its not solely based off of confrontation.  I like that is comes down to victory points and their are different paths to victory. The miniatures in this game are amazing! and they would be awesome to paint.  I also enjoy the card combat and that you can buy different gods based on your needs.  fantastically done game!

title: Got the ki...
description: Got the kickstarter edition from a very generous friend and so now ALL the goodies can come to the table. Well preserved in taylor cut foam. Thanks Baumi!

title: It's a lot...
description:
It's a lot of fun, and it's fluid and fast-moving. I have concerns about the cards, though. In principle, yes, drafting should take care of concerns about card balance--but I'm not sure there's much room for hate-drafting in this game. In a game like Fairy Tale, where you will only play 60% of your cards, you could easily hate-draft. But in Blood Rage, you can easily play all of your cards each era, which encourages everyone just maximizing your own strategy's score. If that's true, then I worry that some strategies are vastly superior to others--compare the points for dead dudes vs. ship upgrades, for example.
But it's still very fun and it seems to win friends wherever it goes.
[EDIT] Further evidence seems to be allaying my fears. This sucker appears to have legs.
